original_text: The Ammonite soldiers marched out from their city. They stood at the entrance of their city and they were ready to fight. The other kings and their soldiers stayed in the fields near the city.
korean_text: 암몬 자손은 나가서 성문 앞에 진을 치고 도우러 온 여러 왕은 따로 들에 있더라

sentences.original_text: They stood at the entrance of their city
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그들의 도시 입구에 서 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: and they were ready to fight
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 싸울 준비가 되어 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: The other kings and their soldiers
